'''David''' or '''Dave Lewis''' may refer to:

{{TOC right}}
==Academics==
*[[David Lewis (lawyer)]] (c. 1520–1584), Welsh civil lawyer and first Principal of Jesus College, Oxford
*[[David Lewis (psychologist)]], English author and psychologist
*[[David C. Lewis (physician)]], addictions treatment and drug policy expert
*[[David Henry Lewis]] (1917–2002), navigator and adventurer
*[[David Lewis (philosopher)]] (1941–2001), American-born philosopher famous for his theory of modal realism
*[[David Levering Lewis]] (born 1936), American historian and winner of the Pulitzer Prize for Biography or Autobiography
*[[David Malcolm Lewis]] (1928–1994), professor of ancient history at University of Oxford
*[[David Lewis (academic)]] (born 1960), English professor at London School of Economics who specialises in development policy and management
*[[David W. Lewis]] (1815–1885), academic and politician in the U.S. state of Georgia

==Arts==
*[[David Lewis (American actor)]] (1916–2000), known for his role as Edward in the American soap opera ''General Hospital''
*[[David Lewis (Canadian actor)]] (born 1976), played Walt Lawson in the film ''Lake Placid''
*David Lewis, writer of Christian fiction, some co-written with his wife [[Beverly Lewis]]
*[[Dave Lewis (musician)]] (1938–1998), 1950s and 1960s African-American Seattle rock musician
*[[David Lewis (poet)]] (1682–1760), British poet
*[[David Lewis (producer)]] (1903–1987), Hollywood film producer and partner of film director James Whale
*[[David Lewis (singer)]] (born 1958), lead singer for the R&B group Atlantic Starr
*[[David C. Lewis (musician)]], keyboard player and composer
*[[David Lewis (Australian musician)]] (born c. 1960), Australian-born jazz and pop trumpeter, pianist and composer
*[[Dave Lewis (British musician)]] (born c. 1951), Belfast-born singer-songwriter, a member of the bands Method and Andwella's Dream

==Business==
*[[David Lewis (designer)]] (1939–2011), industrial designer well known for his work for Bang & Olufsen
*[[David Lewis (English merchant)]] (1823–1885), English merchant and philanthropist 
*[[David S. Lewis]] (1917–2003), American aerospace engineer and engineering industry executive
*[[David Edward Lewis]] (1866–1941), businessman and philanthropist
*[[Dave Lewis (businessman)]] (born 1965), British businessman

==Politics==
*[[David Lewis (MP)]], Member of Parliament (MP) for [[Monmouthshire (UK Parliament constituency)|Monmouthshire]] in 1554
*[[David Lewis (politician)]] (1909–1981), Russian-born Canadian politician and lawyer, leader of the New Democratic Party of Canada
*[[David John Lewis]] (1869–1952), American politician, U.S. Representative from Maryland
*[[David P. Lewis]] (1820–1884), Governor of Alabama, USA
*[[David R. Lewis]] (born 1971), Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly
*[[David Lewis (Lord Mayor)]] (born 1947), solicitor and Lord Mayor of London, 2007–2008
*[[David Lewis, 1st Baron Brecon]] (1905–1976), Welsh businessman and Conservative politician
*[[David William Lewis]] (1815–1885), Confederate politician
*[[Dave Lewis (politician)]] (born 1942), American Republican member of the Montana Legislature

==Religion==
*[[David Lewis (Jesuit)]] (1616–1679), one of the forty Catholic Martyrs of England and Wales
*[[David Lewis (Carmarthenshire priest)]] (1760–1850), Welsh Anglican priest
*[[David Lewis (priest)]] (1814–1895), Anglican priest who converted to Catholicism
*[[David Lewis (archdeacon)]] (died 1901), Anglican priest and Archdeacon of Carmarthen

==Sportsmen==
*[[David Lewis (American football)]] (born 1961), former professional American football tight end 
*[[David Lewis (cricketer, born 1927)]] (1927–2013), Zimbabwean cricketer
*[[David Lewis (cricketer, born 1940)]], Welsh cricketer
*[[David Lewis (rugby league)]], rugby league footballer of the 1900s for Other Nationalities and Oldham
*[[David Lewis (sport shooter)]] (1879–?), British Olympic shooter
*[[David Lewis (tennis)]] (born 1964), New Zealand tennis player
*[[Dave Lewis (athlete)]] (born 1961), British long distance runner
*[[Dave Lewis (footballer)]], [[Cheltenham Town F.C.]]'s all-time leading goalscorer
*[[Dave Lewis (ice hockey)]] (born 1953), Canadian NHL former head coach of the Boston Bruins and Detroit Red Wings
*[[Dave Lewis (linebacker)]] (born 1954), former American football linebacker
*[[Dave Lewis (punter)]] (born 1945), former American football punter
*[[Dave Lewis (racing driver)]] (1881–1928), American racecar driver
*[[Dave Lewis (rugby union)]] (born 1989), Gloucester rugby scrum-half
*[[Dai Lewis]] (1866–1943), rugby union footballer of the 1880s for Wales and Cardiff
*[[Dai Lewis (footballer)]] (born 1912), Swansea Town F.C. and Wales international footballer
*[[David Morral Lewis]] (1871–1925), Bangor F.C. and Wales international footballer

==Other==
*[[David "Robber" Lewis]] (1790–1820), American outlaw
*[[David Thomas Lewis]] (1912–1983), U.S. federal judge
*[[David J. Lewis (architect)]] (born 1966), American architect

==See also==
*[[David Maybury-Lewis]] (1929–2007), anthropologist
